Niamh.gae0:
Mallaidh Dubh:
A Níamh Cínn-Óir,
banphrionsa Tír na nÓg,
tá droch-scéal agam.
Niamh.eng0:
Black Molly:
Níamh Cínn-Óir,
 princess of Tír na nÓg,
I bear dire tidings.
Niamh.gae1:
Níamh Cínn-Óir:
  Mallaidh Dubh, abair liom, 
 cad atá ag cur imní ort?
Niamh.eng1:
Níamh Cínn-Óir: 
 Black Molly, Pray, 
 what troubles you?
Niamh.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh:
  Tá droch-fáistineachta, 
 ag na draoithe.
Niamh.eng2:
Black Molly: 
 The druids see dark omens.
Niamh.gae3:
Níamh Cínn-Óir:
 Drochrath? Éadóchas? Cé is cúis le seo?
Niamh.eng3:
Níamh Cínn-Óir:
 Doom and despair? 
What is the reason for this?
Niamh.gae4:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
Ironkey is ainm dó. 
Le léigiún mheaisíní agus arrachtí,
 tá sé ag iarraidh ár dtír a ghabháil.
Niamh.eng4:
Black Molly: 
'His name is Ironkey. 
With his legions of machines and monsters, 
he seeks to conquer our land.
Niamh.gae5:
Níamh Cínn-Óir: 
Gairmfaidh mé laoch 
chun forsaí a chruinniú dár ríocht.
Niamh.eng5:
Níamh Cínn-Óir: 
I will summon a champion 
to gather defenders to our realm.

Douglas_Hyde.gae0:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
A Dhuibhghlas, 
Laoch na hÉireann, 
tagaim le drochscéal.
Douglas_Hyde.eng0:
Black Molly: 
Douglas, Hero of Ireland, 
I come bearing dire tidings.
Douglas_Hyde.gae1:
Douglas Hyde: 
Mallaidh Dubh, tá tú ar ais 
ón domhan thíos ar deireadh! 
Cén imní atá ort?
Douglas_Hyde.eng1:
Douglas Hyde: 
Black Molly, you have returned 
from the underlands at last! What troubles you?
Douglas_Hyde.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
Imní go deimhin, a Dhuibhghlas.
 Tá Ironkey, lena mheaisíní, 
ag máirseáil ar ríocht na Sióga.
Douglas_Hyde.eng2:
Black Molly: 
Trouble indeed, Douglas. 
Lord Ironkey, with his machines, 
marches on the Fairy Underworld.
Douglas_Hyde.gae3:
Douglas Hyde: 
Ironkey? 
Tá súile leagtha ag an créatúr sin 
ar Tír na nÓg?
Douglas_Hyde.eng3:
Douglas Hyde: 
Ironkey? That creature has set his sights 
on Tír na nÓg?
Douglas_Hyde.gae5:
Douglas Hyde: 
Ní mór dúinn glaoch
 ar laochra na hÉireann 
chun tacú linn.
Douglas_Hyde.eng5:
Douglas Hyde: 
We must rally 
the champions of Ireland.

Oisin.gae0:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
A Oisín, mac Fhionn, 
tugann do láthair 
dóchas dom.
Oisin.eng0:
Black Molly: 
Oisín, son of Fionn, 
your presence 
brings hope.
Oisin.gae1:
Oisín: 
Mallaidh Dubh, 
Cén éadóchas a raibh ort?
Oisin.eng1:
Oisín: 
Black Molly, 
What caused your despair?
Oisin.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
Dul chun cinn gan staonadh, 
Tiarna Ironkey agus a meaisíní 
ifrinniúla.
Oisin.eng2:
Black Molly: 
The relentless advance of Lord Ironkey 
and his infernal machines.
Oisin.gae3:
Oisín: 
Ironkey? Ní aithním 
an tainm sin.
Oisin.eng3:
Oisín: 
Ironkey? I do not recognise 
that name
Oisin.gae5:
Oisín: 
Cruinnímís 
laochra na hÉireann 
chun ár thaobh.
Oisin.eng5:
Oisín:
Let us rally 
the champions of Ireland 
to our side.

Sirriam.gae0:
Mallaidh Dubh:
A Alexander ar deireadh! 
Táim fillte ón gcath thíos.
Sirriam.eng0:
Black Molly:
Alexander at last! 
I have returned from the battle below.
Sirriam.gae1:
Alexander Nicolson: 
Agus cén scéal  atá agat, 
ón gcogadh i gcoinne Ironkey?
Sirriam.eng1:
Alexander Nicolson: 
And what news have you 
from the war against Ironkey?
Sirriam.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
Déanann a chuid meaisíní 
agus arrachtaigh 
na ríochtaí níos ísle a chreachadh.
Sirriam.eng2:
Black Molly: 
His machines and monsters ravage the lower kingdoms.
Sirriam.gae3:
Alexander Nicolson: 
Níl neart go chuir le chéile.
Glaofaidh muid 
ar forsaí na Gael
Sirriam.eng3:
Alexander Nicolson: 
There is no strength without unity. 
Let us muster the Gael.
Sirriam.gae4:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
Ach cé ina measc 
a fhreagróidh ár nglaoch?
Sirriam.eng4:
Black Molly: 
But who among them 
will answer our call?
Sirriam.eng5:
Alexander Nicolson: 
Come.
We shall see.

Mug_Ruith.gae1:
Mug Ruith:
Mallaidh Dubh, 
bhraithim do láithreacht.
Mug_Ruith.eng1:
Mug Ruith:
Black Molly, 
I sense your presence.
Mug_Ruith.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh:
A saoi, 
tá eagla orm nach feidir
Tír na nÓg galánta seasamh
i gcoinne acmhainn cogaíochta Ironkey.
Mug_Ruith.eng2:
Black Molly:
O wise one
I fear gallant Tír na nÓg 
can't stand 
against Ironkey's war capacity.
Mug_Ruith.gae3:
Mug Ruith:
Go deimhin, Ach ná bíodh eagla ort, 
tiochfaidh ár comhghuaillithe 
i gcabhair orainn.
Mug_Ruith.eng3:
Mug Ruith:
Indeed. 
But fear not, 
our allies will stand with us.
Mug_Ruith.gae5:
Mug Ruith:
Tá ár nasc domhain. 
Is féidir le cú amháin slua a gairm. 
Lig dúinn ár cú a roghnú...
Mug_Ruith.eng5:
Mug Ruith:
Our bond is deep. 
One hound- can summon a host. 
Let us choose our champion...

Abhartach.gae1:
Abhartach: 
A Mallaidh Dubh, 
nach milis d'eagla. 
Cad a spreag thú 
chun cúnamh a lorg uaimse?
Abhartach.eng1:
Abhartach: 
Black Molly, 
your fear is a sweet nectar. 
What has led you 
to seek the aid of one such as I?
Abhartach.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh: 
A Thaoiseach na dorchadais, 
tá Ironkey, lena meaisíní agus arrachtaigh, 
ag máirseáil i leith le huacht cearnóir.
Abhartach.eng2:
Black Molly: 
O Chieftain of darknesses, 
Ironkey, with his machines and monsters, 
marchs hither with the will of a conqueror.
Abhartach.eng3:
Abhartach: 
Ironkey! 
A formidable foe indeed!
Abhartach.gae4:
Mallaidh Dubh:
conas is féidir linn 
a ionsaí a sheasamh?
Abhartach.eng4:
Black Molly: 
How we may withstand 
his onslaught?
Abhartach.gae5:
Abhartach: 
Libh féin, ní féidir. 
Cruinnigh laochra na hÉireann 
ar shon na cúise.
Abhartach.eng5:
Abhartach: Alone, you cannot. 
Call upon the champions of Ireland 
to the cause.

Fionn.gae0:
Mallaidh Dubh:
A Fhionn! Tá muid faoi ionsaí!
Fionn.eng0: Black Molly: O Fionn! we are under attack!
Fionn.gae2:
Mallaidh Dubh:Ironkey
 é a cuing-cheangalíodh Sídh
Fionn.eng2:
Black Molly:
lord Ironkey, 
he who enslaves
Fionn.gae3:
Fionn:
 Tá an craobh líath ulamh.
Fionn.eng3: Fionn: The grey branch is ready.
Fionn.eng4:
Black Molly:
It is not enough.
Fionn.eng5:
Fionn:
Behold! I summon a champion.

Pooka.gae0:
Iolchrothach aosta
an bhfuil tú ann?
Pooka.eng0: Black Molly:ancient shapeshifter are you there?
Pooka.gae2: Mallaidh Dubh: Tá na hísealríocht claoidhte.
Pooka.eng2: Black Molly: The lowerkingdoms have fallen.
Pooka.gae4:
Mallaidh Dubh:
Cad é sin?  Tá laochra na hÉireann sa tobair?
Pooka.eng4: Black Molly: What's that? The champions of Ireland are in the well?

Fand.gae0:
Mallaidh Dubh:
A Aigéan aidhbhseach impídmh ort!
Fand.eng0: Black Molly: Oh vast, terrible ocean I entreet upon you!
Fand.gae1: A Mallaidh Dubh, cuireann do ghuth croí na farraige féin. Cad is cúis imní don tír, a chara?
Fand.eng1: Beware, Black Molly, Mac Lír's aid is not to be sought lightly
Fand.eng3: Fand: 'tis I, Fand, who'll guide you to the champions ye seek.
Fand.eng4: Black Molly: then there is hope! Lead on, o muse.
Fand.eng5: Fand: Let us choose our champion...
